Records.Description: Summary Tables for BLA Batch Analysis DS
Records.SqlStatement:
SELECT "Batch Number", "Acceptance Criteria", "Analytical Procedure", "Quality Attribute", "Text Parameter Value", 'Results' as "RESULTS", 'Lot Number' as "LOT NUMBER"
FROM MIPRANS_OWNER.DELL_CQA_BA
WHERE "Product" = ? AND "Batch Number" IN (?)
GROUP BY "Batch Number", "Analytical Procedure", "Quality Attribute", "Acceptance Criteria", "Text Parameter Value"
ORDER BY "Analytical Procedure"
